issue.title: [C++] Add tests for DayTimeIntervalBuilder
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7938](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7938). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7938?focusedCommentId=17399774) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
[~emkornfield@gmail.com] Do you still want to be assigned this issue?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7938?focusedCommentId=17399812) by Micah Kornfield (emkornfield):*
I took care of this as part of MonthDayNano work, so I think we can leave it assigned to me and I'll update once the PR for that gets merged.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7938?focusedCommentId=17565695) by @toddfarmer:*
This issue was last updated over 90 days ago, which may be an indication it is no longer being actively worked. To better reflect the current state, the issue is being unassigned. Please feel free to re-take assignment of the issue if it is being actively worked, or if you plan to start that work soon.
